name: text_format
author: johnsonfung
description: Format entire text with various transformations including find/replace, append, prepend, and case conversions

commands.name: replace
commands.description: Find and replace text throughout the document.

commands.name: append
commands.description: Add text to the end of the document.

commands.name: prepend
commands.description: Add text to the beginning of the document.

commands.name: sentence_case
commands.description: Convert entire document to Sentence case.

commands.name: title_case
commands.description: Convert entire document to Title Case.

commands.name: capitalize_first
commands.description: Capitalize the first letter of the document.

commands.name: remove_quotes
commands.description: Remove surrounding quotes from the entire document.
